decoder.name: usergate_1
decoder.prematch: \S+ \S+ utm-loganalyzer traffic - - \S+CEF:0\|\S+\|\S+\|\d\|traffic\|\S+\|\d\|.+ src=\d+.\d+.\d+.\d+ spt=\d+ .+ proto=\S+ dst=\d+.\d+.\d+.\d+ dpt=\d+ .+

decoder.name: usergate_1_child
decoder.regex: \S+ (\S+) utm-loganalyzer traffic - - \S+CEF:0\|\S+\|\S+\|(\d)\|traffic\|(\S+)\|(\d)\|.+ src=(\d+.\d+.\d+.\d+) spt=(\d+) .+ proto=(\S+) dst=(\d+.\d+.\d+.\d+) dpt=(\d+) (.+)

decoder.name: usergate_2
decoder.prematch: \S+ \S+ utm-loganalyzer events - - \S+CEF:0\|\S+\|\S+\|\d\|events\|\S+\|\d\|.+ suser=\S+ cat=\S+ act=\S+ src=\d+.\d+.\d+.\d+ .+

decoder.name: usergate_2_child
decoder.regex: \S+ (\S+) utm-loganalyzer events - - \S+CEF:0\|\S+\|\S+\|(\d)\|events\|(\S+)\|(\d)\|.+ suser=(\S+) cat=(\S+) act=(\S+) src=(\d+.\d+.\d+.\d+) (.+)

decoder.name: usergate_3
decoder.prematch: \S+ \S+ \S+ utm-loganalyzer traffic - - CEF:0\|\S+\|\S+\|\d\|traffic\|\S+\|\S+\|.+proto=\S+ .+ src=\d+.\d+.\d+.\d+ spt=\d+ smac=\S+ dst=\ d+.\d+.\d+.\d+ dpt=\d+ dmac=\S+ in=\d+ out=\d+ .+

decoder.name: usergate_3_child
decoder.regex: \S+ \S+ (\S+) utm-loganalyzer traffic - - CEF:0\|\S+\|\S+\|\d\|traffic\|(\S+)\|\S+\|.+proto=(\S+) .+ src=(\d+.\d+.\d+.\d+) spt=(\d+) smac=(\ S+) dst=(\d+.\d+.\d+.\d+) dpt=(\d+) dmac=(\S+) in=(\d+) out=(\d+) (.+)

decoder.name: usergate_4
decoder.prematch: \S+ \S+ \S+ utm-loganalyzer events - - CEF:0\|\S+\|\S+\|\d\|events\|\S+\|\d\|.+ suser=\S+ src=\d+.\d+.\d+.\d+ cat=\S+ .+ cs1=.+

decoder.name: usergate_4_child
decoder.regex: \S+ \S+ (\S+) utm-loganalyzer events - - CEF:0\|\S+\|\S+\|\d\|events\|(\S+)\|\d\|.+ suser=(\S+) src=(\d+.\d+.\d+.\d+) cat=(\S+) .+ cs1=(.+)< /regex> usergate.node,traffic_type,srcuser,srcip,traffic_component,traffic_msg
